file_content.text: You're looking a lot better that's for sure.
It will mean nothing until you drive the ghosts from your mind.
Hey, we're getting a holocall here. Someone named "Moff Pyron."
Then the time has come for you to crush Thanaton so that I may devour him.
Excellent. But don't forget Moff Pyron's generous offer. A superweapon could be quite useful against Thanaton. Not to mention the support of a Moff.
